instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-3437 macbook air missing half the led backlight
threads.message: So I have a 3437 board that i replaced the led driver on, and now i have backlight, but only half the backlight is working, one half of the screen is normal brightness but the other half is darker, is this a bad led strip or did i solder on the chip incorrectly

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-3437 macbook air missing half the led backlight
threads.message: Ill go for a bad soldering if the display assembly is a known good, also measure led return resistors...

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-3437 macbook air missing half the led backlight
threads.message: ill solder on a different chip when i get home i have no idea if the displays good or not and dont have a test screen, thank you

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-3437 macbook air missing half the led backlight
threads.message: Measure all LED return lines on diode mode. Could also be a bad trace or resistor in those lines. Or a bad connector/cable/LCD

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-3437 macbook air missing half the led backlight
threads.message: im waiting on some more chips from louis, i used my last one that i just took off

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-3437 macbook air missing half the led backlight
threads.message: okay so now i put a new chip on, and the backlight is flickering, still only the half of the screen though

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-3437 macbook air missing half the led backlight
threads.message:
[QUOTE="dukefawks, post: 23767"]Measure all LED return lines on diode mode. Could also be a bad trace or resistor in those lines. Or a bad connector/cable/LCD[/QUOTE]

What about this??

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-3437 macbook air missing half the led backlight
threads.message:
isen1 : .641
isen2: OL
isen3: OL
isen4 OL
isen5: OL
isen6: OL

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-3437 macbook air missing half the led backlight
threads.message: all resistors reading under 1 ohm, all measurements were done with the cable plugged in

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-3437 macbook air missing half the led backlight
threads.message: The return lines read open so it is either a bad trace/bad resistor or badly soldered LP8550. All return lines should read the same on diode mode.

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-3437 macbook air missing half the led backlight
threads.message: for some reason im thinking not all the balls on the chip melted, cuz i fluxed it up and just heated the hell out of it and it kind flowed a little bit into place, now its working fine, thanks for the help guys
